---
title: "oci_provided_no_auth.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for an OCI (Open Container Initiative) repository. It specifies the storage type, repository location, local directory for bundles, and polling interval for updates.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block for storage settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the storage type and OCI-specific configuration.

___

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage being configured.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The storage type, set to "oci" |

___

### `storage.oci`
#### Description
Contains the configuration details specific to OCI storage.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the repository, bundles directory, and poll interval for OCI storage.

___

### `storage.oci.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the target OCI repository.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The OCI repository URL and tag |

___

### `storage.oci.bundles_directory`
#### Description
Defines the local directory where bundles will be stored.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| bundles_directory | string | The local path for storing bundles |

___

### `storage.oci.poll_interval`
#### Description
Sets the interval for polling the OCI repository for updates.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| poll_interval | duration | The time interval between polls |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "oci" | Specifies the storage type as OCI |
| storage.oci.repository | string | "some.target/repository/abundle:latest" | The OCI repository URL and tag |
| storage.oci.bundles_directory | string | "/tmp/bundles" | Local directory for storing bundles |
| storage.oci.poll_interval | duration | "5m" | Interval for polling the repository |

Note: This configuration file does not include any authentication settings, which is reflected in the filename "oci_provided_no_auth.yml". In a production environment, proper authentication would typically be required to access an OCI repository.
